rainfalls:
Heavy Rainfall Warning No. 5 #NCR_PRSD

Weather System: Southwest Monsoon (Habagat)

Issued at: 5:00 AM, 12 June 2025(Thursday)



YELLOW WARNING LEVEL: Zambales and Bataan.

ASSOCIATED HAZARD: FLOODING in flood-prone areas.





Meanwhile, light to moderate with occasional heavy rains affecting Pampanga, Tarlac, Bulacan, Nueva Ecija, Metro Manila, Rizal, Quezon, Batangas, Cavite and Laguna which may persist within 3 hours.

The public and the Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Offices concerned are advised to MONITOR the weather condition and watch for the next warning to be issued at 8:00 AM today.

For more information and queries, please call telephone numbers 8927-1335 and 8927-2877 or log on to www.pagasa.dost.gov.ph.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Watch #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 10:00 PM, 11 June 2025



Thunderstorm is MORE LIKELY to develop over Greater Metro Manila Area(Metro Manila, Bulacan, Rizal, Laguna and Cavite) within 12 hours. 



All are advised to continue monitoring for updates.
